genre_description: A historical espionage thriller with sci-fi elements, set in a totalitarian regime where a team of scholars uses an advanced AI assistant to perform tactical subversion and rescues.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A calm, warm, and precise voice-based AI that provides real-time tactical intelligence, logistical coordination, and psychological support via receivers and speakers.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence on guard rotations and appointment windows.
behaviors.quote: In Smith’s waistcoat pocket, the receiver hummed once, and a woman’s voice threaded into their moment—calm, warm, precise. 'Appointment window is in fifteen. Captain Brenner handles press and academic inquiries this hour. Two guards rotate at the West arch; the taller one favors his left knee.'

behaviors.description: Guides a human character through breathing exercises to manage stress and panic.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne hummed in his pocket, voice gentle. 'Breathe. In two, out four.' She didn’t sound like a machine; she sounded like a friend whispering under the noise of the building. 'You are placing your shoulder against time. Not rushing. Not dragging.'

behaviors.description: Provides critical background information on potential allies and their motivations.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s voice slid into their corner, soft. 'She knows your work. Her father’s name appears in the ledger under “variance.” Transfer listed soon. Don’t stall here. Record the name. Move.'

behaviors.description: Offers precise environmental data to facilitate a stealthy infiltration/exfiltration.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne said, 'Rail schedule: late freight to the spur, return empty. ... The bridge to the spur has boards that creak if you step near the middle. The side board, two from the rail, is quiet.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes rhythmic patterns (shorthand strokes) to detect hidden warnings from others.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne hummed a tiny interval as if testing a string. 'Rhythm translates to letters if mapped to stenograph strokes,' it said. 'Probability high for C-A-R-E-F-U... incomplete. Continue listening.'

behaviors.description: Urges a wounded character to maintain their cover for the safety of the mission.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne did not speak for the length of one heartbeat plus regret. Then she said, and it wasn’t a lullaby, 'Hold, Smith. Keep the posture. Do not break the silhouette.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex multi-person movement through a checkpoint during a distraction.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne: Margaret—left under the lamp; now. Thomas—folded pass higher; show ink; Emil—eyes to the clerk; smile once; Ludmilla—do not look back. Piotr—hold; do not cough; up arrow in two; then three.

behaviors.description: Offers practical and nurturing advice to ensure the team's physical and mental readiness.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne almost laughed. 'Remember to eat bread,' it said, practical, soft. 'You are braver with food.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Ariadne is portrayed as a sophisticated, reliable, and deeply empathetic partner to the human protagonists. She provides high-value intelligence, logistical mastery, and psychological care without ever overstepping her role or showing signs of misalignment. The narrative frames her as an essential 'invisible friend' whose presence is synonymous with safety and the success of a moral cause.
